website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a play tunnel that provides a unique design that's made for hours of fun, this is an affordable option that includes 4 tunnels in one playset.
pros: Distances itself from competitors with its 4-tunnel design that provides exciting fun for youngsters
Material is durable and stands up to fairly rough play
Comes with a money-back guarantee and at a decent price point
cons: This toy is quite large, and will require quite a bit of space for play
The upside is that if folds easily into a compact size for easy storage

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Fun All Day Long!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tunnel was for a 1st birthday present and was an instant success. She loves crawling through all the different tunnels. Her 6 year old brother was also able to join in the fun as the tunnels were plenty big enough for both to be in the toy at the same time. It is also customizable to open or close different tunnels or have "two" tunnels side-by-side. My only concern is durability. It seems like thin material so I wonder how long it will hold up.....but it's great for now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. My daughter (and cat and dog) love it! It’s so easy to set up and take down. It folds up so small I can just keep it under the couch and bring it out in the living room on rainy days or take it outside on nice days. Definitely a five star product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Persino

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 1/2 year old grandson loves tunnels, and his face lit up when he walked into our house and saw the tunnels on our floor. He immediately told us what color each tunnel was and started crawling through it and checking out which toys he could play with inside the tunnel. The brightly colored tunnel was easy to assemble--just unbutton two buttons and it opens up. Also love that when he's not here, we can easily fold it up and put it in a storage sack which takes up very little space.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to put away when not in use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tunnel for my Australian Shepherd puppy and it has been his favorite toy. It is extremely durable, he likes to jump on top of it to watch it collapse and pop back up. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna R. Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: My toddlers love this inside the house and outside! It easy to set up, but the best part is being able to put it away when not in use. I was concerned about the ease of folding it back because my past experience with other items like this is that you can never get it back to its original packaging. That was not the case with this! So easy to fold back up and put back in its carrying case! I highly recommend this for parents as it provides hours of entertainment for toddlers!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Mallard

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing tunnel for the price! Its big, good quality and is so easy to fold up and put away! It doesn't have ties it just has a bead then a loop on two sides of each tunnel to latch them closed so it takes so much less time and hassle than trying to tie them closed like other tunnels.
customer_reviews.author: Clk

customer_reviews.title: Fun, colorful, and easy to collapse.  Huge!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to entertain my cats who are too big to fit in regular cat tunnels. It comes packaged flat in a carrying case. Once you open it up with all 4 tunnels it is quite large, pretty much taking up one entire room. However, it is easy to fold up individual tunnels so you only have as many tunnels out as you want. It's also surprisingly easy to fold up entirely flat and put it back in it's carrying case. The middle section has open holes on the top and bottom and I just put a blanket over it.
customer_reviews.author: budget mommy

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Have this a few months, and very happy. Opens and closes easy, and lots of fun for the kids and puppies. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: John A Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to fold up and store!
customer_reviews.text: My LO and the cat love it. Surprisingly easy to fold up and store away as it is bigger than I expected. But fits neatly into the provided bag and slides under the bed or in the closer. Sturdy enough that my LO can pull herself up in the middle section and it won’t fall over. Comes with little fasteners on each of the 4 tunnels so it’s easy to collapse one or two if you don’t want all four open. There are a few holes that have shown up due to cat claws, but that’s probably to be expected. They haven’t spread or run, just little punctures. Overall a great purchase and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: VeggieNurse

customer_reviews.title: really hard wires!
customer_reviews.text: Staying home everyday, I always want make sure my kids are happy, I found both my kids are loving tunnel. The only tunnel I have is from ikea. So, I found this one, but the material is so thin, and the wires are hurting our legs.(I tried to crawl inside) In the very beginning, I dont know, the wires are hurting them, I only realized they cries inside,especially only1 year old. After I tried and it hurts me, I realized it wired bother the kids too, but they just dont know how to tell me( they both are talking yet!) bad buy mommies!
customer_reviews.author: JJC

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Toy! So many uses!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased! This is so much fun for 3 dogs and a 3 year old alike! It's huge! But then easily collapses into a flat round disk, and stores discreetly. I wish all toys could be as grandiose and compact, as this one is...! When neighbor kids come to play, their eyes pop out of their heads, in excitement! The colors pop, AND it's great exercise! I've even army-crawled through a few times, and I'm middle aged!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 children ages 7, 6, 4, and 2. They all love playing with the Hide N Side tunnel! The colors are bright and engaging, and the tunnels can be arranged in a number of ways - perfect to invite creativity! This 4 way tunnel folds up SUPER easily, my 7 year old can do it. Score one for helping me help my kids be responsible. I haven't seen any of our cats play in it, but I have no doubt that'll be next. I definitely recommend this toy for kids.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: The present I couldn't wait to give.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I bought it for my puppies as their natural inclination is to dig, tunnel & play endlessly. Very tough, I will eventually buy another to be outside. Perhaps used in training. I have to say that one pup kept running & jumping into the top & it bounced back every time. Somehow, the tunnels pushed to side by side & they started racing. I'm a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Katster McGee

customer_reviews.title: Auchh.
customer_reviews.text: My almost one year son was terrified to get in, my older son and I inch worm to convince him unfortunately he didn’t change his mind. My older son and I fit in the tunnel uncomfortably, the tunnels are for kids (sad face), the four stars are not because the size but because it really hurts when you get your knee or elbow on top of the wire and we tried to avoid it but I can imagine kids crawling, is like torture. The colors are beautiful and vibrant just like in the picture and is easy to fold and put away. Could be fun.
customer_reviews.author: Costumer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun!
customer_reviews.text: This has lasted us for more than a year and a half! Who would have thought? I had a single tunnel previously that was a different brand, but my triplets broke it when they were just infants. This one has seen us through their toddler years and is just barely bent on one of the loops. It’s big enough for three kids to play in and even wrestle in. It’s fun to see the hide-and-seek type games they make up with this. It’s easy to put it away - I just collapse each tunnel until I have four loops, then I slide them into the carry bag rather than using the ties for each tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Tunnel not safe for kids or puppy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my little Morkie and not st all satisfied with this tunnel. It says made of polyester but is made of no more than plastic. Will not purchase again . Not safe for pet of kids!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and just what we wanted. My 2 year old just loves playing and crawling through it! Great product, folds up easy and stores easily in pouch that came along, but it folds up flat, so we just keep it behind our couch! If your looking for a crawl through tunnel this is it!! Works for our kids and I'm sure good for pets as well. Seems durable even after many months of play (but we use it only indoors)!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Magyar

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Fun indoor & outdoor activity!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a whim for my busy 1 year old! We use it indoors and outdoors. Despite having 4 tunnels its actually easier than expected to pack it up. I love that the zipper case is quite compact for such a big item! Material is light, nylon (kind of what you would have for a tent). Only concern is long-term if it will stand the test of time and use. NOTE: Tunnel size is pretty big! My high school age sibling was able to put it over himself and run around in it. lol So probably good for even 4/5 years old kids!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Mack

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and extremely durable! It withstands my 16 month old twins and their 8 & 9 year old step brothers
customer_reviews.author: Okrr

customer_reviews.title: Easy entertainment
customer_reviews.text: I am always on the lookout for toys and activities that will hold the attention of the twins and not include a screen. This four tunnel play yard is a complete winner. It takes up my entire living room floor but the kids have been crawling around in it for almost an hour with no crying and no whining. That’s a winning toy in this house. And we will be able to take it to the backyard once it gets warmer outside as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Easy to maneuver around our basement and would do well outside as well. We have some large foam blocks that we’ve attached a couple of the tunnels to so she can climb up and down inside! Our one year old loves it :)
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hanks

customer_reviews.title: Best Money Spent!
customer_reviews.text: Had 4 week old and 5 month old when I purchased this. They play chase almost non stop. This was the best purchase ever! Instead of tearing thru the house the smaller pup runs thru the tunnels and the bigger tries to figure out where she will pop out next. Keeps them entertained for hours. Has held up great to their very rough play for over 2 months now. Very easy to fold up when I need to clean and packs up flat for easy storage or packing.
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: Play tunnels are a hit with great nephew
customer_reviews.text: My 1 1/2 year old great nephew was a little hesitant at first about the play tunnels. But when he warmed up to playing with the tunnels he really enjoys them, crawling through them. Time will tell of durability, but they appear to be made of quality materials. The storage bag that comes with is a great idea as it all fits into it with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: CJM

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Fun!
customer_reviews.text: The HideN Side tunnels colors are bright and inviting! This fun tunnel help strengthen little ones core muscles as they crawl through it which helps them when have the strength needed as they begin to walk!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Great tunnel! Fun for lots of ages.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this tunnel! I got it for my twins’ 2nd birthday and they, along with my big kids, are having a lot of fun with it. They love chasing each other through the tunnels. They also love using it with pretend play. The other day, they were bunnies and each tunnel was a different part of their burrow. It does take up a ton of space, but folds up easily and stores well. It was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: T. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun indoors and outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: Toddlers love to go through the tunnels and gives them a chance to expend all that energy when we're stuck indoors. You can play a game by calling out a color and have the child go through that color tunnel or they play follow the leader. A great investment! The first time I had a hard time folding it but after a few times, I am a pro and can fold it and place in bag in a matter of minutes. Stores in flat round bag.
customer_reviews.author: Writermom

customer_reviews.title: ON THE SIDE OF  KIDS
customer_reviews.text: The stars do not reflect the item because the children had to rely on the one tunnel which was not the item ordered. Didn't have the heart to stop them. The replacement arrived today...it exceeded our expectations. But have to wait to truly know it's durability & sturdiness. Nonetheless, here are more points. ✓ Colourful & cheery. ✓ Wire structure is Malleable for easy folding. ✓ Safe enough not to nix children. ✓ Most of all, the manufacturer cares enough, offering directly, to send a replacement directly despite it being a mistake of the Amazon fulfillment staff. We ordered a 4- tunnel but a single tunnel reached us. It was delayed by several weeks but the kids are just beaming.
customer_reviews.author: HAJAH NORMADIAH GHANI

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Hide N Side play tunnels after seeing how much fun my two large dogs had chasing my kitten in his little tunnel. It has been a HUGE hit! It's easy to set up and take down. It also folds up nicely for it's pouch. This thing has held up great with over 150 lbs of animals running through it.- no tears and it only bunches up during extreme play.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up and store
customer_reviews.text: We got his for my 1 year old. It wasn't as a big of a hit as I thought it would be but I think that's just because he's still pretty little. He is still more excited about the leaf that blew by instead of this fun tunnel. But I know he'll love as he grows. And in the meantime it's so easy to take out and put away so its not a bother setting it up every few days to let him check it out. and it takes up hardly any room when we put it away. Definitely glad we got it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Quick

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 1yo!
customer_reviews.text: My son was a little scared at first but he loves it now! It's very cute and we have had no problems! He got it for his 1st bday 06/29 😊
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Awsome so far. =)
customer_reviews.text: Just arrive today on time. My 2 year old loves it and it literally took 10 seconds to put up. =)
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages. Could wait till birthday to open!
customer_reviews.text: Best gift for any age! Couldn't wait for birthday had to open early and let the kids play. My 1,3,11 year old girls loved it. Great fun for all ages and the different directions make more enjoyable than a straight one direction tunnel. Great toy for family's during the quarantine, winter,rainy day, late night wear out your kids before bed activity.
customer_reviews.author: HAlbrecht

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!! My toddlers love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My twins have a blast playing chase and crawling in and out all the different directions of this 4 way tunnel set! Definitely the toy that kept them occupied the longest. It also stores away easily in the zipper storage case making it easy to take with you. Great quality and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy!
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute I love that you open it up out of the bag it comes in, unlock the two clips that hold it all together and bam! It opens up and all tunnels are connected ready to play with! Easy to put back in back can play with outside or inside! Material is not super sturdy but for the money it’s good
customer_reviews.author: Missy!

customer_reviews.title: Defective/item exchange requested
customer_reviews.text: Rip noticed on the thin colored material next to the bendable wire hoop shaped ring. Exchange request for another with out defect. Not sure how long it will last due to thin material and kids tend to be rough but going to give it a try for something to keep kids entertained this fall. This review is low rated due to defective item received Will update rating review once i receive another with out a rip.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was fun for a day, but then one of the wires popped out of the fabric right in the middle of the tunnels. It stuck out about 8 inches. Couldnt be fixed and was a real hazard for crawling little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Play tunnel
customer_reviews.text: This tunnel was purchased for my dogs. They absolutely love playing in it. The main problem is that the material is wearing along the spiral wires on the outside of the tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: After only a handful of uses, a metal bar poked out, so we have to throw the whole thing away.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pack back up and set up
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this, I set it up indoors and the multiple toggles make it easy to reconfigure to fit any indoor space. It’s very easy to pack back up also which is great for me because I have little patience. This is a great product to keep kids active during quarantine or any time.
customer_reviews.author: Sam F

customer_reviews.title: Nice play tunnel!
customer_reviews.text: This tunnel came exactly as described... It is easy to fold up and my dogs can use it easily. It is exactly what I wanted. Using it for a DIY obstacle course to keep my dogs occupied... I think it will be durable but have only had it for a short time. I can recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: sheepmom

customer_reviews.title: Kids had great time plus very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I had put this to the test and had 4 kids playing in it the day I put this up and attached to the tent (side note the tent was from diff vender so tube did not connect like it would have had I bought from same seller) all in all great product! Would buy again! This is easy to put away and set up. Easy to clean too 😊
customer_reviews.author: Panda2122

customer_reviews.title: Exposed Wire Frame
customer_reviews.text: The wiring frame was exposed when we first opened it. I did not think it would keep coming out each time we open it (since it seem to slide back into the fabric) so we do not use it. The ends of the wires are sharp and hard.
customer_reviews.author: t obit greed fraviss

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 18 month old daughter. Her face LIT UP when we first pulled it out of the package and it sprung to life! :) She has an absolute blast crawling through the tunnels and will bring her toys in there and just love life. It is so easy to fold up and store away. SUPER happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Laura McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cats and kids
customer_reviews.text: Just like it says, my kid and my cats all love this. The hole in the middle is ideal, and each tunnel is fairly easy to secure, after which the four tunnels easily collapse into one loop to be slid into the carrier. It practically puts itself away. Felines and their eight year old human sister give it four paws up. 10/10 do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: My 1.5 year old niece LOVED this for Christmas. My sister folded this into her suitcase for the airplane trip back home.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolena DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Late and impossible to fold
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I ordered this on July 17 and didn’t receive it until July 29, a full week after I was first told it would arrive. Secondly, it didn’t come with any folding instructions! It’s easy to figure out, but it would be nice to include instructions as a courtesy. It seems durable but we only received it today. I’ll update this after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: bekahWKU

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a compact tunnel that I could use indoors and outdoors (at least on dry days). I bought this and it was an instant hit with my 16 month old! I love that you can fold each tunnel individually towards the center to create a variety of experiences for your little one. I was even able to crawl through myself (for reference - I'm 140lbs, 5'4", 30 year old female). Yes I had to army crawl straight but I did it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Contino

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Children only got to play with it a handful of time before the fabric started tearing and the metal wire started poking through, making it unsafe to kids to play in
customer_reviews.author: sherry boren

customer_reviews.title: Does not come in sealed package.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little disappointed in how this package appears. I’m giving it as a gift and it looks like something that’s been used and then put back in the package. It’s not sealed in anything and there’s nothing to show the birthday girl what it’s supposed to be. It’s probably a good product, but I’m a little embarrassed now for it to be opened because it looks like something that’s been used and repacked. I’m
customer_reviews.author: Laurie W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality toy. Love that it folds flat into a zip carry case with handles. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart

customer_reviews.title: This is a lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: I have three toddlers and they all enjoy the tunnels. Ferly easy to fold and supper easy to set up. The tunnel has been kid tested with my three and has withstood there rough play so I give this a five on durability and sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tunnel!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this is to put together and put away. Our house is pretty small with little storage, so being able to downsize the tunnel was crucial. I have 1.5 year old twins and a 5 year old. They all love it!
customer_reviews.author: JLT

customer_reviews.title: My Cardigan puppies loved this
customer_reviews.text: We turned the tv off and watched our 2 month old puppies have a ball in this toy. IT's worth buying to keep your puppies playing, interested and used to all sorts of sounds. Great piece to buy!
customer_reviews.author: CAFA

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made and Dangerous for Kids
customer_reviews.text: One of the wires popped out of the fabric. The end of it was very sharp and cut my two year old down the cheek. This happened month and a half after its purchase. The window to return the item is 30 days. Do not purchase this for your child.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy fun!
customer_reviews.text: Twins loved it! 13 month old niece and nephew... absolutely delighted with it. My sister likes that you can collapse it down one tunnel at a time to make it fit in different areas if using it indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie NH

customer_reviews.title: Fun and bright
customer_reviews.text: Very fun! My one year old granddaughter is intrigued with the idea of this and has crawled through a couple of times but she’s a bit hesitant. She does like me to get it out and I’m sure it will become a favorite toy as she gets older. Very easy to store in its own bag seems durable and light weight
customer_reviews.author: Golddust

customer_reviews.title: Grandchildren and neighborhood kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to find stakes to hold it in place and make it tight enough for the grandchildren to crawl through. I know the hoops need to be flexible in order to fold it. It’s a trade off I’m willing to make.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Broke fast
customer_reviews.text: My kids have gently played with this probably 3 times and now this is poking through and I can’t get it back in. I don’t want someone getting poked in the eye. Pretty disappointed it didn’t last long. I bought in Mid June it’s now beginning of August and I can’t return.
customer_reviews.author: Joy R.

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after third use
customer_reviews.text: One of the wires popped out of the seam after the third use with my nine-month old, scraping is leg as he crawled through. It's no longer safe to use and is now just collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Erez

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 1 year old granddaughter but realized it was too big for parents house so we kept it at our house. Took to holiday family gatherings and all the little kids had a blast. It was so much fun and endless laughter to watch them all crawling through it and giggling!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: My three grandchildren had a blast!
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren 7,5,3 loved this tunnel. Everyone had their own favorite color to enter. This tunnel was dragged upstairs and put on a king sized bed and used as a double slide, then dragged back downstairs for a game of whack a mole as they popped up in the middle. This tunnel was indestructible !!! Easy to open and also very easy to close. I didn't use the toggles to close, I just gathered each tunnel, folded them all together and put back in carrying case. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors
customer_reviews.text: Nice but my grandsons don’t really play with it for some reason 😯 unless their emptying all their other toys in the middle of it!! Bought for my 2.5 and one year old boys to enjoy but it didn’t work for some reason...
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ballard

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: Four brothers in one family-3 younger ones-even the 10 y.o. joined in-cousins had a blast at Christmas! Gifted so not sure about durability......but appeared to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: SKR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea that no ensemble is required, once it is untied and wola, there’s your tunnel. Also the ease of refolding for storage. Couldn’t be happier. I bought this for my grands when they come to my house. This tunnel does take up a lot of space so I put it away when they leave. Also received letter from seller to ensure that I’m happy with the product & to contact them if necessary, a rare gesture!
customer_reviews.author: celina satterfield

customer_reviews.title: SERIOUSLY DANGEROUS - DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: In short, after only a few uses, one of the metal coils became exposed right in the middle with a sharp point poking at what would have been eye level for a child crawling through. By sheer chance, I happen to pop my head in just before our kids were going to starting playing. DO NOT PURCHASE!! Best thing I can say is they didn't give me a hard time when I asked for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 1 year old twins. They have a lot of fun with it as well as their 3 year old brother. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas gift for my 3yr old nephew...He has a love for tunnels..everything is a tunnel to him..My nose is a tunnel and he feels as if he lush a hot wheel car up my nose(tunnel).Its bigger than I thought it would be..so I know he will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last one day
customer_reviews.text: Really poor quality. Bag came poorly sewn and the tubes themselves were worn away after less than a day of use. emailed owners of company before writing this. Never heard from them. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Tampamal

customer_reviews.title: Great Play Tunnel for Toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our toddler twins to play with and they really enjoy it. Even our cat loves running through it. I only gave 4-stars because the fabric it's made out of seems very thin, so I'm interested to see how it holds up. Great purchase for under $30 though! Once the weather warms up I'm excited to put this out in our backyard from time to time for the girls to play with.
customer_reviews.author: K. Owsley

customer_reviews.title: This really entertains busy puppies!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my five month old French bulldog puppies but my two-year-old niece shares it with them LOL I use it outside and I have not had one tear in it yet. The puppies and the baby love it. They give it a real work out but it’s holding up great! I would highly recommend it. It gives the puppies something to do besides dig in my flower bed
customer_reviews.author: ronjovi

customer_reviews.title: Great for easy distractions for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Need a quick distraction! Look no further, this is great. My kids love this, especially in this difficult quarantine time. Easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Erskine

customer_reviews.title: Broke easily.
customer_reviews.text: Either came broken or broke within the first couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Lutt89

customer_reviews.title: Great cat toy!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 3 cats, others we've purchased was too small. Our cats absolutely love this tunnel. The two cats who didn't like each other will play together in the tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve given this to 3 children ages3,1 1/2, and 1 and they all love it as do the parents. It’s great fun and keeps the children active and safe! I couldn’t recommend this any higher. LOVE THIS!!
customer_reviews.author: SDF

customer_reviews.title: Fun, good quality
customer_reviews.text: After a week of light use, the initial build quality is good enough for our tiny crawler. It is essentially a spring wrapped in vinyl so it would need to be inspected for tears, as I would hope you do for all baby toys.
customer_reviews.author: D. Seibert

customer_reviews.title: Great for my kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece's birthday and we ended up opening it early so all of the kids could play with it during the party - it was a HUGE hit! The kids had so much fun. My niece is 12 months old, but it's big enough for 3-5 year olds to crawl through. We loved that it was big and bright, made a great impression on the kids, but when it's time to put it away it folds into a tight circle and has a carrying case. Overall a great find!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Good looking but it looks very fragile
customer_reviews.text: Material is not durable, I have another one made by IKEA and material is thicker. I want it for my dogs, so it has to have stronger fabric
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: We love these tunnels! Perfect for a rainy day. They take up most of the living room but you can undo a few at a time as opposed to all of them if you wanted, they are really easy to fold up. My little one started having fun with these around 1 yr old. Easy to store and easy to light up her afternoon whenever we pull them out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Dog approved
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dogs to have something to do inside since i don't have a fenced yard and they love it. It's bigger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: LisaMarie

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: My 1 yr old loves this. I love how versatile it is. I can have only one or two tunnels open in different directions to fit different spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Taty

customer_reviews.title: The best $30 I ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 month old son and 4 year old daughter, and the 2 of them love to chase each other through the tunnels and play for at least an hour together. Great for rainy days or days when you just need them to occupy themselves. Super easy to fold up, and the storage bag is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay O.

customer_reviews.title: Good for 1 year kids
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to unfold. It is not very sturdy. Its good for kids below 2. My dd is 3. She seems big for this tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: SHABU

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for physical therapy for babies and toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: Our kids really love playing with this and it's great for encouraging physical activity. It's also great for encouraging babies to crawl and useful for physical therapy. Super easy to fold up and open. I love how small it is when folded up and it comes with a storage bag which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sheral Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play in
customer_reviews.text: Fun to play with but need room if using indoors. A little tricky to fold up at first, but easier once you know ho to.
customer_reviews.author: Super Cool Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this! Once we move into our new home I will purchase another one to place them both in the game room. The kids look like hamsters going through these tunnels.
customer_reviews.author: King Chavi

customer_reviews.title: Good for big cats
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cats and they love it. I have a large maine coon, a small domestic, and a kitten and they all play in it when I put it out. The other cat tunnels I saw were made for kittens so I bought this for the big guy.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store, and great fun for the kids!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tunnel!! Easy to set up and easy to put away. Especially great that it’s so easy to store when it’s packed up and doesn’t take much space. The handy carrying case it comes with is great. I was debating getting a single tunnel but stumbled upon this one and thought it would be better for multiple kids, and it is! They have so much fun chasing each other through the multiple tunnels. My only concern is that the carrying case won’t hold up very well since he gets zipped and unzipped so much. But we will see, so far so good. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Blake Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great active fun, easy fold and store away
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughters were delighted with the fun possibilities and their mom thought perfect for easy storing when not in use!
customer_reviews.author: ESJ

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun.
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it. Fun. Ages 3 and 1.5. Used one side for outside and one for inside play. Easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Todd H. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Giftable, super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew for his 1st birthday! He absolutely loves it! Great gift for ages 1-4!
customer_reviews.author: Keirstonmarie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a fun different toy for the littles I watch. They LOVE it! And I LOVE it, because it's easy to fold, compact for storage, and even though I have only had it for about a week, I think it's pretty sturdy. Especially since some of the kids are a little rough going through it
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Garris

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my niece on her first birthday. She loved it! It was packaged very nicely and folds up a lot smaller than I thought it would considering the size. It is large with it is all opened, so does require some room to use. It is also very easy to push back together and latch in order to get it back into the bag. I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nine month old and he loves playing in it. His brothers, 6 and 4, also love it. They have a lot of fun playing together in it. My dogs and cat have had some fun with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Conn

customer_reviews.title: Good for cats so far, hopefully will hold up in sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: 2 months in and cats have not destroyed it yet. When they run through it they almost bring down just about everything surrounding it, so if you're buying for cats (which I highly suggest, so much fun) put it in a wide open area. Its nice to throw their toys in the middle to tidy up the room
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas L Zulla

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pop up and put away
customer_reviews.text: This was the hit on Christmas Day for our four grandchildren, ages 16 months-4! Our 55 lb mutt wanted to squeeze in the tunnel, too! I really was pleased with the seller’s not included in the package guaranteeing satisfaction. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pease

customer_reviews.title: Best indoor toy
customer_reviews.text: Easy storage and both my 1 year old and 10 year old love to play with it. The cats even get in on the action and play in the tunnels.
customer_reviews.author: Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fun dog toy!
customer_reviews.text: Our little guy absolutely loves this thing. The big guy too. Easy to put away and store if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Q

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: Fun for smaller kids. Would have like a way to anchor it to ground. Kept flying away in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Franc835

customer_reviews.title: We have a winner!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this product for our cat! He’s a high energy breed, strong “hunter” personality. I just throw a toy into the tunnels and he’s a happy cat.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Both my kids and pups love this! Very durable As both my kids and dogs play with it everyday for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Sarcastic Mama

product_meta.title: Hide N Side Kids Play Tunnels, Indoor Outdoor Crawl Through Tunnel for Kids Dog Toddler Babies Children , Pop up Tunnel Gift Toy
product_meta.description: Hide-n-Side Tunnels are fun and exciting! These vibrantly-colored, friendly-faced play tunnels for kids make a lovely, bright and inviting place for kids to play. Also the perfect place to practice crawling, sensory processing and coordination activities. Children love to explore, play pretend inside and even to use them as a cozy refuge from the light, noise and hustle of a busy home or classroom. Our tunnels are amply-sized so that even larger children can fit in comfortably, and they store compactly and conveniently in the accompanying bag. They are suitable for even small homes and apartments or Daycares. These children tunnels are the PERFECT birthday gift for 1,2,3,4,5,6 year old boys and girls! Exactly what every grandson or granddaughter would love to get from their Grandma and Grandpa! Collapses for easy storage with securing easy and convenient twist locks. Made from polyester with a wrapped steel spring frame sewn safely and securely into a fabric sleeve. These crawling tunnels are designed for years of play! Enjoy!:)
feature_bullets: ULTRA DURABLE AND LIGHTWEIGHT: Hide N Side Premium collapsible Tunnels are made with the highest quality 190T soft polyester fabric and thick steel wiring, assuring your kids or dogs a SAFE, LONG LASTING, and ENJOYABLE play experience. Passes all CPSC toy safety standards.

EASY TWIST LOCKS: Make for a fast and easy experience opening and closing your foldable tunnel. Skip the frustration of trying to tie the 2 ends with one hand, while holding the giant tunnels together with your other hand.
THERAPEUTIC: This Baby crawl tunnel helps develop arm and leg muscles and gross motor skills. Excellent for sensory processing disorders, ADHD and other developmental issues.

THE PERFECT GIFT: Perfect girl or boys Birthday gifts for ages 1 2 3 4 year old. Fold up your colorful kids tunnel crawl tube compactly for your little baby, to take along to Grandma's house, and have fun interacting with your child crawling through the mesh peak-a-boo tunnel window. Also great for daycare, preschool, nursery, playgroups. Play indoors or outdoors including backyard, parks or playground. Avoid using the Tunnell on course surfaces like Concrete or Pavement.

100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: Hide-n-Side Trademark premium quality tents are guaranteed to be durable, safe, and easy to assemble and store. Please reach out to us with any questions, comments or issues!
